cu.explanation_en: Setting the global log level to an unknown enum 'invalid_level' will cause the logging system to fail initialization, leading to startup errors or default behavior that may mask important log messages.

du.explanation_en: Setting the global log level to an unknown enum 'invalid_level' will cause the logging system to fail initialization, leading to startup errors or default behavior that may mask important log messages.
du.explanation_zh: 將全域日誌級別設定為未知的枚舉值 'invalid_level' 會導致日誌系統初始化失敗，造成啟動錯誤或預設行為，可能掩蓋重要日誌訊息。
